question: The Indo-US military training Exercise “Yudh Abhyas 2019”  is being conducted in which city?
explanation: The 15th edition of the joint military exercise “Yudh Abhyas 2019” is being  conducted between India and United States at Joint Base Lewis Mc Chord in Washington, USA from 05-18 September. It is one of the largest joint running military training and defence corporation endeavors between India and USA. The exercise will provide an opportunity to the armed forces of both countries to train in an integrated manner at Battalion level with joint planning at Brigade level. Both armies will jointly train, plan and execute a series of well developed operations for neutralization of threats of varied nature.
